snippet: As a feat of event planning, there is nothing quite like an election-night party, which could be an evening of triumph or fiasco, a celebration or a wake.
abstract: Flexibility and tact are always a must in business of election-night events, as planners play huge logistical guessing game; Las Vegas is arguably greatest election-night city in country because many of its ballrooms can expand or contract quickly to accommodate victory or loss.
lead_paragraph: As a feat of event planning, there is nothing quite like an election-night party, which could be an evening of triumph or fiasco, a celebration or a wake.

headline.seo: In Election-Night Party Planning, Flexibility Is a Must
headline.main: Party Planning, for Both Victory and Defeat
headline.print_headline: Party Planning, for Both Victory and Defeat
